projects.name: Book Store
projects.description: Led the development of a MERN Stack-based Online Library platform, managing books with seamless CRUD operations for books. Integrated Tailwind CSS for optimized interface design.

projects.name: The Monthly Wrap
projects.description: Developed a robust full-stack blogging platform with rich text format (RTF) capabilities, enabling users to read, write, like and comment on blogs, significantly enhancing features by 150%. Implemented user authentication functionalities including signup, login, and profile management with individual profile pages allowing users to customize and edit their details.

experiences.description: Developed 3 Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) for the company using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Transformed Figma designs into pixel-perfect user interface components that over 98% resembled the original design. Optimized performance of the products by integrating Million.js.

Directed frontend development of TBI KIETs website from concept to launch. Enhanced user engagement by implementing an automated event details section for both upcoming and past events, contributing to a 30% rise in event attendance and interaction. Coordinated 5+ events with 95% attendee satisfaction by fostering cross-functional collaboration. Designed and integrated website modules for TBI KIET, highlighting facilities, organizational insights, and 8+ linked incubation schemes to boost SEO performance.

Orchestrated and executed a highly successful E-Summit event spanning 3 days with over 10 sub-events, attracting 1500+ registrations with a team of 40+. Developed the frontend of the events website using NextJs, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, facilitating seamless user registration for 500+ participants. Mentored 20+ participants during a hackathon held as part of the E-Summit.

full_output.name: Aditya Pandey
achievements_and_awards: Contributed actively to Hacktoberfest 2022 with 7+ merged pull requests.
Elevated to maintainer in Hacktoberfest 2023, fostering open-source collaboration.
Outperformed over 100 competitors and placed in the top 10 of Monsoon Season of Code competition.
Solved over 150 DSA questions across various coding platforms.
